snippet: Marissa Mayer’s challenge will be to resuscitate a moribund company and to avoid the fate of so many other experienced executives who have run Yahoo.
abstract: Google executive Marissa Mayer joins Yahoo as its fifth full-time chief executive in five years; analysts say her challenge will not only be to resuscitate a struggling company, but to avoid the fate of many other experienced executives who have been unable to attract advertisers and increase revenue at Yahoo; Mayer's first challenge will be to articulate a vision for the firm.
lead_paragraph: Marissa Mayer’s challenge will be to resuscitate a moribund company and to avoid the fate of so many other experienced executives who have run Yahoo.

headline.seo: Marissa Mayer Hopes to Brighten User Experience at Yahoo
headline.main: Mayer Hopes to Brighten User Experience at Yahoo
headline.print_headline: Mayer Hopes to Brighten User Experience at Yahoo
